On-line Appendix A1 A1 WTPPP Construction We construct WTPPPah by estimating patient utility parameters and then simulating changes in values from removing hospital systems. Specifically, let patient iÃ¢â¬â¢s utility uij from choosing hospital j for her inpatient stay be given by: uij = ÃÂ´ij + ÃÂµij, (A1) where uij is a function of the mean utility, ÃÂ´ij, which depends on interactions of patient and hospital characteristics, including travel costs between patient i and hospital j; and an unobservable ÃÂµij, which is i.i.d. and distributed type I extreme value.

We estimate ÃÂ´ij using the semi-parametric estimator of Raval et al. (2017). The method estimates the probability that each patient i seeks care at hospital j in system s, based on the observable characteristics of the patient and hospital. We denote this probability probij.
